original_text: I want to say the same thing to you who are young men. You must respect the authority of the leaders. All of you who are believers must respect one another. Do not think that you are more important than other people. The Bible says:
korean_text: 젊은 자들아 이와 같이 장로들에게 순종하고 다 서로 겸손으로 허리를 동이라 하나님은 교만한 자를 대적하시되 겸손한 자들에게는 은혜를 주시느니라

sentences.original_text: I want to say the same thing to you
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 너희에게 똑같은 말을 하고 싶다

sentences.original_text: You must respect the authority of the leaders
All of you who are believers
Do not think that you are more important
